typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvinceCode as string,
		StateProvinceName as string,
		CountryRegionCode as string,
		EnglishCountryRegionName as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceGeogrpaphy
SourceGeogrpaphy derive(HUB_Geography_HK = sha2(512, GeographyAlternateKey),
		LOAD_TS = currentTimestamp(),
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF = sha2(512, GeographyAlternateKey,City,StateProvinceCode,StateProvinceName,CountryRegionCode,EnglishCountryRegionName,PostalCode)) ~> HashColumns
